duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, implement, and maintain data architecture to cater to the financial planning and analysis needs of the organization.
Develop efficient and reliable data integration strategies to consolidate data from various sources, ensuring data accuracy and consistency across the financial planning and analysis platform.
Create complex financial models within Anaplan to support scenario analysis, profitability analysis, and other financial modeling exercises.
Continuously evaluate the performance of Anaplan models and make necessary optimizations to enhance system efficiency and user experience.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Finance, Business Administration, or related field.
